name: Project Space Runners
description:
NeuraSpace Corporation is highly elated to announce it's latest endeavor in the service of the modern healthcare industry.

Project Space Runners is aimed to engage audiences around the world in helping Alzheimer's patients. Play Project Space Runners, and you'll be joined by one of our Alzheimer's patients watching your game through a live-stream. NeuraSpace hopes that watching the players playing the game will help recreate a range of feelings and thus help in memory recall. 

We thank you for being part of a project which we are confident will be beneficial to a lot of people.
